name: cURLUpload
description: Use cURL to upload files with supported protocols. (FTP, FTPS, SFTP, HTTP, and more)
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: files
inputs.label: Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: File(s) to be uploaded.  Wildcards can be used. For example, `**\*.zip` for all ZIP files in all subfolders.

inputs.name: username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the username to use for server authentication.

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the password to use for server authentication.

inputs.name: url
inputs.label: URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the URL where the file(s) will be uploaded to.  Directory should end with a trailing slash.  Possible protocols include DICT, FILE, FTP, FTPS, GOPHER, HTTP, HTTPS, IMAP, IMAPS, LDAP, LDAPS, POP3, POP3S, RTMP, RTSP, SCP, SFTP, SMTP, SMTPS, TELNET and TFTP.

inputs.name: options
inputs.label: Optional Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional arguments that will be passed to cURL.
